text: Dzherokay () is a rural locality (an aul) in Dzherokayskoye Rural Settlement of Shovgenovsky District, the Republic of Adygea, Russia. The population was 1098 as of 2018. There are 16 streets. == Geography == The aul is located on the Fars River, 4 km south-east from the Khakurinokhabl aul. == Ethnicity == The aul is inhabited by Circassians. == References == Category:Rural localities in Shovgenovsky District
title: Dzherokay
